function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Diffusion of infectious diseases through interpersonal transmission","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases across large distances","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to limit human movement and mobility, increasing awareness of transmission risks, and promoting vaccination","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, remote monitoring technologies, and vaccination tracking systems","People":"Global population, travelers, and densely populated areas","Owner":"Government health agencies, international health organizations, and local communities"},{"Description":"Lack of understanding of viral transmission in the context of spatial diffusion","Impact":"Inadequate response and control measures for contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Investing in geographic research on viral transmission, integrating geographic factors into epidemiological models, and enhancing cross-disciplinary collaboration between virologists and geographers","Technologies":"Geographic information systems, spatial analysis tools, and interdisciplinary research platforms","People":"Academic researchers, epidemiologists, and geographers","Owner":"Universities, research institutions, and interdisciplinary research groups"},{"Description":"Different types of spatial diffusion facilitating the spread of infectious diseases","Impact":"Increased complexity in developing targeted containment strategies for contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Adapting containment strategies to different types of spatial diffusion, implementing targeted interventions based on diffusion types, and enhancing surveillance and monitoring in high-risk areas","Technologies":"Geospatial analytics, real-time infectious disease tracking systems, and satellite imagery analysis","People":"Health authorities, policymakers, and disease control experts","Owner":"Public health agencies, government departments, and research organizations"}]}
